}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1244-01000920-50Z" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
===Probable used PSU(s)=== Multiple power supplies are shown in the FCC photos... *'''Asian Power Devices''' WA-30B12 *'''Asian Power Devices''' DA-48T12
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Asian Power Devices |model = WA-30B12 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.8 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |countrymanuf = China |style=large, vertical }}
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Asian Power Devices |model = DA-48T12 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=1.2 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=C7 |output_v=12 |output_a=4 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |countrymanuf = China |style=modular, brick }}
